===Exploration===
* [[Contaminated Bacterial Mat]]: a contaminated pool covered by a bacterial mat that can be cleansed using the ability of the [[Xenochromatic Ball Octopus]]
* [[Dangerous Autocannon]]: dangerous cannons that automatically fire at the player, can be disabled using the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus
* [[Dew Bubble]]: bubbles that pop when attacked and may ring Harmonious Reed Pipes within a certain radius. They can be pushed around using the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus and a bubble pushed into another one will combine into a larger bubble with a larger radius.
* [[Floating Crystal Flower]]: a challenge involving the player finding their way to an end platform by passing over several invisible platforms. The challenge is started by using the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus's ability on the floating crystal flower.
* [[Harmonious Reed Pipe]]: a challenge involving several numbered reed pipes that must be rang by Dew Bubbles in the indicated number order.
* [[Huge Shell]]: large seashells that open when attacked, often revealing some type of item.
* [[Humongous Hat Jellyfish]]: when entered, this jellyfish-like mechanism will propel the player upwards. They can be pushed around using the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus's ability.
* [[Operable Mechanism]]: puzzles involving aligning beam receivers with beam generators, or aligning crystal chunks on their pedestals on a track.
* [[Potential Energy Orb]]: a challenge involving shooting a large ball into one or more rings using the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus's ability.
